name: BrightGift Blog and Image Generator Workflow

filters.q: subject:"Re: Blog Ideas Ready for Review" newer_than:1d is:unread

parameters.subject: BrightGift Response Error – No Choice Detected
parameters.message: Hey Jeff — we received a reply, but couldn't find a valid "--- IDEA X ---" format in the message.  Please reply using the format:  --- IDEA 1 --- Notes: Optional message here  Once you do, we'll process it automatically.

parameters.errorMessage: No choice was detected, so Jeff was alerted.

parameters.subject: ❌ BrightGift Agent Timeout Alert after 10 Tries

parameters.errorMessage: GPT blog assistant failed after maximum retries. Alert email sent to Jeff.

parameters.commitMessage: Remove temporary image after ImageKit conversion
